channel.title: CVE Feed for LENZE -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for LENZE -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-2302|2024-08-03T00:32:09.616Z -- lenze -- cabinet%20c520
item.description: Multiple Lenze products of the cabinet series skip the password verification upon second login. After a user has been logged on to the device once, a remote attacker can get full access without knowledge of the password.
